# NSScroller.Style.legacy

**Case**

Specifies legacy-style scrollers as prior to macOS 10.7.

## Declaration

```swift
case legacy
```

## Constants

- **NSScroller.Style.overlay**: Specifies overlay-style scrollers in macOS 10.7 and later.

items.description: Specifies overlay-style scrollers in macOS 10.7 and later.
items.name: NSScroller.Style.overlay

title: NSScroller.Style.legacy
